text: When Clooney split from his 2011 girlfriend Elisabetta Canalis, she said the two had a "father-daughter relationship." Of course, some media outlets took this as an opportunity to suggest the actor was gay. And, Clooney's response to these rumors really highlights the reason we love him so much. To deny he was gay would be insulting to the gay community, he said.Clooney told Esquire U.K.: "I think it’s funny, but the last thing you’ll ever see me do is jump up and down, saying, 'These are lies!' That would be unfair and unkind to my good friends in the gay community. I’m not going to let anyone make it seem like being gay is a bad thing. My private life is private, and I’m very happy in it. Who does it hurt if someone thinks I’m gay? I’ll be long dead and there will still be people who say I was gay. I don’t give a sh*t." Boom.
